name: Neural Fish Tank
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to swim around.
Dash or start game by pressing Space.
Catch a fish and use it to plug the leaks.

All art is generated using Deep Neural Networks from simple black and white pictures (press R to see them) combined with Van Gogh, Picasso and some prehistoric cave paintings.

Code and Design by Jannek Egeskov Kristensen http://vildninja.dk

Audio by Andreas Lagerstedt https://soundcloud.com/pearlcorder

All code on GitHub https://github.com/vildninja/neuralfish

Watch the game with demo of style transfer on YouTube https://youtu.be/vSWwnWDtGEs
